comments.body:
I 'd actually changed Dialog to do it and then checked with the Material Design folks. Their feedback:

> ..this particular example is trying to decrease the prominence of it because they want users to focus on the main question (which is in the dialog title). Since the body text there is mostly a deeper explanation of the title question, its been given the secondary color (54% black).

I think we do need an easier way to say: give me lower contrast text color per the current theme.
